basics.summary: Highly skilled senior web engineer with over 12 years of experience leading multiple product launches, building 3 web browsers, hundreds of open source projects, performant React apps, and web standards.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Led team of 6 to re-architect consumer and business facing web product experience, resulting in 3x user engagement.
Mentored 80+ team members, wrote documentation, gave tech talks to significantly raise quality of testing, performance, and accessibility in high-traffic, high-scale web application.
Reduced thousands of developer man-hours by writing detailed tech specs and clear designs ahead of time.
Shipped multiple Copilot AI apps in just 2 months by rapidly prototyping and guiding peers on JS, React, CSS needs.
Quadrupled React performance by using deep understanding of React and web internals to alter rendering frequencies.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Unblocked features for millions of users by keeping up-to-date with new technologies to invent virtualizer for 1K+ pages.
Established best practices for writing reliable, maintainable, and testable React code used by hundreds of engineers.
Reduced bugs in design to engineering handoff by creating new Figma token libraries and internal tools for designers.

work.name: Mozilla
highlights: Built and shipped brand new consumer facing web browser in Kotlin to 100M+ users on [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.mozilla.firefox).
Partnered with engineers at Google, Intel, and Apple to add maskable icon support to Firefox, Chrome, and Safari.
Set desktop web & mobile web (Android/iOS) interaction standards as World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Invited Expert.
Onboarded 5K+ developers onto Compose UI by writing React to Compose dictionary docs.
Successfully coordinated the inclusion of Firefox in the Google Chrome Dev Summit keynote in front of hundreds, by suggesting then implementing new Trusted Web Activity product feature.

work.name: Google
highlights: Increased new user retention & saved 100+ KB by building internal desktop web tool to analyze millions of Java methods.
Prevented months of release schedule delays by identifying Java resource limits that were nearly exceeded.
